User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the GenHPP application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Calculation.title: Calculation
Calculation.description: Represents a single HPP calculation performed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the calculation entity.

productName.description: The name of the product for which HPP was calculated.

productImageUrl.description: The URL for the product's image.

materials.description: A list of material costs associated with the product.

laborCost.description: The labor cost associated with producing the product.

overhead.description: Overhead costs associated with producing the product.

packaging.description: Packaging costs associated with the product.

totalHPP.description: The total HPP calculated for the product.

suggestedPrice.description: The suggested selling price for the product.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the calculation was performed.

PublicCalculation.title: PublicCalculation
PublicCalculation.description: Represents a calculation shared publicly by a user, excluding personal data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the public calculation entity.

productImageUrl.description: The URL for the product's image.

totalHPP.description: The total HPP calculated for the product.

suggestedPrice.description: The suggested selling price for the product.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the calculation was performed.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment made by a user on a public calculation.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the comment.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

userPhotoURL.description: The photo URL of the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

ChatSession.title: ChatSession
ChatSession.description: Represents a single anonymous chat session between two users.

participantIds.description: An array containing the UIDs of the two participants.

status.description: The current status of the chat session.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the session was created.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within an anonymous chat session.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The multi-format content of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

AiChatMessage.title: AiChatMessage
AiChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat session with the AI.

content.description: The content of the message, can be multi-part.

data.description: Can hold structured data like a calculation.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.  Authorization is based on path ownership: only the authenticated user can access their own profile.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores calculation history for each user. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID. Authorization is based on path ownership: only the authenticated user can access their own calculations.  Includes the 'userId' field to enforce ownership invariants.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: calcId
params.description: The unique ID of the calculation.

definition.description: Stores publicly shared calculation data. No user-identifiable information is stored here to maintain privacy. Anyone can read these calculations, but only the original user (verified via a server-side function or callable) can create/delete/modify them.

params.name: calcId
params.description: The unique ID of the public calculation.

definition.description: Stores comments for a public calculation. Anyone can read, but only authenticated users can write. The 'calcId' parameter corresponds to the ID of the public calculation.

params.name: calcId
params.description: The unique ID of the public calculation.

params.name: commentId
params.description: The unique ID of the comment.

definition.description: Stores metadata for an anonymous chat session. Access is restricted to participants.

params.name: sessionId
params.description: The unique ID of the chat session.

definition.description: Stores messages for a specific anonymous chat session.

params.name: sessionId
params.description: The unique ID of the chat session.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique ID of the message.

definition.description: Stores the messages for a specific AI chat session for a user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user.

params.name: conversationId
params.description: The unique ID of the conversation.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique ID of the message.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is updated to support both the anonymous chat and the AI Business Friend features. The anonymous chat uses the top-level `chat_sessions` collection. The AI chat history is stored in a private sub-collection `ai_conversations` under each user to ensure privacy.
